meanings.definition: The branch of medicine dealing with the correction of deformities of bones or muscles.
meanings.sent1: Orthopedics helps fix bone and muscle problems.
meanings.sent2: I visited the orthopedics department for my fractured arm.
meanings.sent3: The orthopedics clinic was full of patients with broken bones.
meanings.sent4: Her expertise in orthopedics was like a magic wand for my twisted ankle.
meanings.sent5: The orthopedics specialist carefully examined my spine.

meanings.definition: The medical specialty concerned with the preservation, restoration, and development of the musculoskeletal system.
meanings.sent1: Orthopedics focuses on keeping our bones and muscles healthy.
meanings.sent2: My uncle underwent orthopedics treatment to improve his mobility.
meanings.sent3: The orthopedics team worked together to help the athlete recover.
meanings.sent4: The importance of orthopedics in sports is like a shield for athletes.
meanings.sent5: The orthopedics expert recommended exercises to strengthen my joints.
